about_the_game:
Bloodmoon is a 2.5D horror roguelike set in a dark, cursed medieval world where shadows are alive and waiting to strike. As a lone knight, you must survive relentless waves of nightmarish creatures, from demons to zombies, using every weapon and spell at your disposal.

In Bloodmoon, light is both your sanctuary and your greatest weakness. Stray too far from the flickering glow of the farmhouse, and you risk falling prey to the horrors lurking in the darkness. Use your sword to cut down lesser foes, dash and teleport to evade attacks, and unleash fireballs to set enemies ablaze.

Each wave grows harder, with more monsters and increasing damage. Health and mana regeneration are only possible within the light, forcing you to return to the farmhouse and plan your strategy carefully. Level up to increase your stats and face tougher challenges.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later versions (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
